lexUnit.name: school.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: train in a particular skill or activity.

sentence.text: True to his word , he schooled her in horsemanship and was a hard taskmaster .
Over the last hundred years the proletariat has schooled itself in the pretensions of the bourgeoisie ; while the bourgeoisie , less confident of its ascendancy , has become more sly and deceitful .
For increasingly William and Harry will be schooled by the Queen 's courtiers into the public life that is destined to become their duty .
He was schooled by the shadowy Loremasters of the Tower of Hoeth , who recognised in him great power .
Mr Hayes said : ` We thought of the idea because he came from just up the road from the school and was later brought up and schooled at Great Ayton . "
Born in 1930 in Southport , he was schooled in his home town before studying chemistry at Liverpool University .
Tavernier , born in Paris and schooled in Lyon , was introduced to literary interests early in his school life .
The watchman had been schooled in security and he had been told not to open the door under any circumstances .
She was feeling her loss much more than she revealed ; she was schooled in hiding her emotions .
Executives will continue to run things in the world of computer culture , because they are schooled in dealing with complexity .
But what I still do n't understand is , if you were schooled on this stuff , how do you know it 's wrong ?
Even before university he was being schooled to take over one day .
The pigs were schooled to scale ladders , walk tightropes and perform feats of prestidigitation .
He was determined that his children be well schooled .
` Well , " Twynham interrupted with a grin , ` Lady Francesca was schooled there by the nuns .
She 's schooling her big fellow . "
Come with Ana and me this morning and watch her school her horse .
Judged on the rider , not the horse , but if you have schooled your horse properly , your riding will look better anyway .
You can school him over hurdles . "
It 's a kind of exam -- and it 's important to school yourself to be good at exams .
Now I have my lovely mate , I have schooled myself to be neither malicious nor miserable , and not to hate People .
